p: Dulbecco’s modified Eagle’s medium (DMEM) was purchased from Welgene (Daegu, Korea) and streptomycin and penicillin, fetal bovine serum (FBS), propidium iodide (PI) were purchased from Thermo Fisher Scientific (Pittsburgh, PA, USA). Proteins were detected using PicoEPD Western reagent (ELPIS-Biotech, Daejeon, Korea). Annexin V-FITC apoptosis kit was purchased from Thermo Fisher Scientific (Pittsburgh, PA, USA).
